All art is but dirtying the paper delicately.
Vision is your first creation of the future.
Science is based not on faith but in skeptism
Don't ask too much for space. They grow into voids.
The pendulum of life swings equally to both sides until friction is applied

plaintext: A great artist is always before his time or behind it
title: [170 points] Solve this pollux encoding a quote by philosopher George Moore.
